name: RelaxingPiano
0:
”Alexa, open relaxing piano”
”Alexa, start relaxing piano”
”Alexa, launch relaxing piano”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: relaxing piano
des: Immerse yourself in a world of tranquility with 'Relaxing Piano,' your ultimate companion for soothing melodies and peaceful moments. Let the gentle notes of the piano wash over you, creating a serene atmosphere perfect for relaxation and mindfulness. Whether you're unwinding after a long day or seeking a moment of calm, this skill offers a blissful escape through the enchanting sounds of the piano. Experience the power of music to soothe your soul and elevate your mood with 'Relaxing Piano' on Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
